name: Notion Investment Tracker
description: Manage your stock investments, directly in NotionDo you struggle with investments all over the place? I sure did, which is why I had to come up with a solution. And what better way to solve this problem than a Notion template.Use this Investment Tracker Notion template to get live stock prices into Notion and track your portfolio like a pro.‍What you’ll get: a tutorial to help you retrieve live stock prices into Notion a space to add all your investments a space to see your portfolio value, prof
features: a tutorial to help you retrieve live stock prices into Notion; a space to add all your investments; a space to see your portfolio value, profit & loss, and portfolio percentage; a space to manage your different accounts
